test.name: 游댌 All CRUD API Tests (Create + Get + Update + Delete)

test-method.name: testDeletePostWithInvalidId_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 游댮 Delete post with invalid ID should return 404

test-method.name: testDeletePostWithoutAuthToken_ShouldReturnUnauthorizedOrNotFound
test-method.description: 游댮 Delete post without authorization token should return 401 or 404

test-method.description: 游릭 Delete a post by ID

test-method.name: testDeletePostTwice_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 游댮 Deleting same post again should return 404

test-method.name: testGetDeletedPost_ShouldReturn404
test-method.description: 游댮 Get deleted post should return 404

test-method.description: 游댮 Update user with invalid email format

test-method.description: 游댮 Update user with invalid ID

test-method.description: 游릭 Update user with valid data

test-method.description: 游릭 Delete comment by ID

test-method.description: 游댮 Deleting already deleted comment should return 404

test-method.description: 游릭 Fetch all users - Should return 200 and at least one user

test-method.description: 游댮 Fetch single user by invalid ID - Should return 404 Not Found

test-method.description: 游릭 Fetch single user by valid ID - Should return 200 and user details

test-method.description: 游댮 Invalid email format should return 422

test-method.description: 游댮 Missing name should return 422

test-method.description: 游릭 Update a comment successfully

test-method.description: 游릭 Update post title and body
